Here are some words with the suffixes -less and -ful.
A search engine is useful in getting information.
A library with no books is useless.
The woman at the front desk was very helpful.
A baby is helpless and vulnerable.
Be careful when you use the knife.
It was very careless of you to forget your wallet.
Bezos and Zuckerberg are successful businessmen.
There are many homeless people in America.
